comment._content: Don't forget that today is the 70th Anniversary of the Doolittle Raid! :-) April 18th 1942- April 18th 2012.

comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: "1355" is the Lockheed construction number = BuNo 37389. She served with VPML-2 between November 1946 and June 1947, when she was transferred to a pool at NAS Alameda, CA.
